Detailed Description

cvmx_cpri::_prbs_config

This register configures transmission and validation of PRBS patterns. The PRBS patterns can be used for diagnostics with external loop-backs, or to support manual receiver tunning if necessary.

When [PRBS_MODE] is set to any value other than 0x0, the transmitted IQ samples for all AxCs will be replaced with a test pattern. When configured, the AxC sample width must be set to 8-bits, and the AxC mapping must be configured accordingly.

On the receive side, CPRI will validate the received test pattern and record the validation status in CPRI()_PRBS_STATUS.
